items.sentence: I think it's unlikely that Tom will ask Mary to do that.
Do you think that Tom would like me to help him do that?
Did Tom say that he didn't think that we had to do that?
Do you think that anyone would care if I didn't do that?
Did Tom say that he didn't think that we should do that?
Tom was supposed to buy flowers for Mary, but he forgot.
This is such an interesting story. I'll never forget it.
I think Tom is expecting someone to make dinner for him.
I didn't know that you and Tom were both born in Boston.
Tom knew Mary didn't know John was going to marry Alice.
If you go to the party, I think you'll have a good time.
While Tom was swimming, Mary was building a sand castle.
This would taste better if you'd add a little more salt.
Some of those who were rescued were pretty badly burned.
My grandfather has never consulted a doctor in his life.
Please send me a reply as soon as you receive this mail.
This restaurant lives up to all the rave reviews it got.
You can adjust the color on the TV by turning this knob.
Seen from a distance, the stone looks like a human face.
The little boy got into mischief when he was left alone.
